General notes
----------------

Some notes for better navigating this repository

- this project uses `uv` to manage dependencies. 
- `backend/` contains backend code written using `fastapi` framework
- `frontend/` contains frontend code written using `reflex` framework
- `backend/src/mindweaver/fw` contains a crud framework for the backend
- To test the backend, use `uv run --package backend pytest backend/tests`
- Prefer error 422 for validation issues in backend so that it is consistent with fastapi


Issue & Solution
-----------------

If you see error message similar to this:

```
Warning: Passing None to a Var that is not explicitly marked as Optional (| 
None) is deprecated. Passed isNotNullOrUndefined
reflex___state____state__mindweaver_fe___states___data_sources_state____data_s
ources_state.form_data_rx_state_?.["parameters"]?.["start_url"] : "") of type 
typing.Optional[str] to str | int | float.
```

This is caused by input forms in reflex does not accept None as valid value. YYou should use `util.default()` function to use a blank string as default value if state value is None.
